channel.title: Ultimate Guide To Questions
channel.description:
[center][b][glow=red,2,300][size=30pt]THE COMPLETE GUIDE TO QUESTIONS![/size][/glow][/b][/center]
[hr]
[ul][/ul]
[ul][li][b][iurl=#noob]Am I A Noob?[/iurl][/b][list][/list] [list][li][iurl=#not]What Not to Do.[/iurl][/li][/list] [list][li][iurl=#todo]What To Do.[/iurl][list] [/li][/list] [list][/list] [/list][list][li][b][iurl=#help]Who Will Help Me?[/iurl][/b][list][/list] [list][li]How to get help[/li][/list] [list][li]Were to find help.[list] [/li][/list] [list][/list] [/list][list][li][b]Conclusion[/b][list][/list] [list][li]Helpful Sites.[/li][/list] [list] [/li][/list]
[hr]
[anchor=noob] [b][size=25pt]1. [/size][/b][i][size=25pt]Am I A Noob?[/size][/i] [anchor=not] [size=15pt][b]What Not To Do.[/b][/size]
[i]- Double Posting[/i] Never EVER Double post your question twice... you will totaly be ignored and people wont bother helping you insted they will flame you. [i]- Spamming (Bump)[/i] Dont Expect someone to help you the momment you post.... just wait... i see lots of people posting sthing over and over again and complaining about not being given help. once again people can ignore/flame you... and your topic will risk being locked/deleted.... [i]- Flaming[/i] If somone is trying to help you and they accedintly give you some wrong info.. DONT EVER FLAME THEM! they are trying there best and hardest to help you.... Flaming is against the Rules.... If you do it your account will be banned.
[i]- Rep[/i] If somone has been very nice to you and awnserd all your questions.... NEVER TALk ABOUT REP!!!! once again this is a rule and doing it may risk your account being banned.... if you want to rep them... do so. just dont talk about giving it.... or asking for it
[i]-Lock/Delete[/i] Here is a handy hint... you have just gt your question awnsered you dont need the topic anymore so you edit your post and topic tite to: Delete Me. Please dont do this.... what about other people that have the same question/problem? why dont you leave your question up so other people can gain from it.
[zirak] [i]-Misleading links[/i] If you post and Misleading links their is a result in ban ao please do not make a link for example [/list][/list][/ul] [code][url=http://www.FUCKINGPORN.com]http://www.moparownzu.com/[/url][/code]as a result you can be banned!
[i]-Innapropriate Images /Videos /ADS[/i] NEVER EVER post innapropriate links to these things! As it may Effect a 13- Year old life with those pics... trust me you don't want to do that! And their are many adults on this forum too that will see porno's hentai which they will not want! So please reduce doing that!
[i]-Innapropriate Downloads![/i] This Includes Keyloggers Fake Crackers Viruses Trojan and other Things that can effect you or your computer... Please do not post it as it will not help the community and this will result in a flame/spam/bump or people with fucked up computers... So please do not post it if you like the community.[/zirak] [anchor=todo] [size=15pt][b]What To Do.[/b][/size]
When asking for help... always have the info needed....... For example if i was asking for a program.... and i didnt know if it is free or not and i asked for mozilla firefox craked..... YOU ARE A NOOB! so keep that in mind... always know the infomation.
Another thing to do is make sure you are posting in the right place.... if you are requesting a tutorial.... WRONG SECTION! you will be called A NOOB!, some times you might post in the wrong section by accident... You will still be called a noob for not.
(Refering to the paragraph above) Post in the right forums.... incase you didnt know Mopar is split into two.... Http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf // For everything to do with cheating. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf //For Everything to do with Runescape Private Severs. Always make sure you know were to go..... other wise your a N00B!
[hr] [anchor=help] [b][size=25pt]2. [/size][/b][i][size=25pt]Who Will Help Me?[/size][/i] [anchor=howto] [size=15pt][b]How to get help.[/b][/size]
In your questions make sure you know what you are talking about. Make them discriptive and informative.... if your question is sloppy and messy people wont understand it.. and wont be botherd to help you....
if you have made a topic.... and asking for help... before you do this.... search for your help topic there is a 49% chance that it has already been answerd already... [br][size=1]Posted on: December 27, 2006, 02:26:35 PM[/size][hr] [size=15pt][b]Were to find help.[/b][/size]
[i]-Search[/i] Dont forget that jut simple words like... How to get a program, can mean heaps of things... when you use the search button.... most people are successful in finding what they need by SEARCHING! as i said there is a 49% Chance that your question has already been awnsered....
[i]-Resorces[/i] Google is another great way to find what you are looking for and if you dont google your question before topic... you will get flamed.... like me when ever i see a person that hasent googled it i take them here... http://lagexx.ulmb.com/noob/googleit Just as a joke to get the messege though.
[i]-No Help for 3 days :([/i] Havent gotten help after three days? it is possible that people couldent understand what you were asking... EDIT YOUR ORIGIAL POST! Never Double Post [i](Refering to what not do to)[/i] [b][size=25pt]2. [/size][/b]
[hr] [anchor=conclusion] [i][size=25pt]3.Conclusion[/size][/i]
[size=15pt][b]Useful Links.[/b][/size] I put some jokes on my web sever because when people dont read the stickyes... i give them this http://lagexx.ulmb.com/noob When people dont use google at all.... i give them this http://lagexx.ulmb.com/noob/googleit
So maybe if you go to them sites you might get it in your head.....
[hr]
Thanks for reading the question guide i hope you found this very useful.... [anchor=credits] [glow=blue,2,300]-Wonderguy6 (85%)[/glow] [glow=yellow,2,300]-Zirak (15%)[/glow] [color=white]

item.title: Ultimate Guide To Questions
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

[quote=“Zirakac, post:23, topic:39823”]here are few more
-Bragging
Please Do not Brag others… Because they might want proof etc… which can cause either a massive Spammage or
Flame! And our community hates when that happens so please pervent his from happening!

-Selling

Don’t Sell things that Moparisthebest KNOWES You shouldn’t Be selling
For Example… Dildo’s , RS Cash, Fake Hacking programs, Credit Cards… ETC…
So help us from this happening!

-Drugs

When posting make sure your not on a drug
Because well… here is an example! we will make John Drunk and Taharok Mod

John drougan: j3llo zvp an1 g0t any mo wee
i wan more!! wtf is rs…

Mod Taharok: Sorry, If you need help this is in the wrong section.

John drougan: Isn’t this a onlyne drug stoore???

Mod Taharok: Omg Not a drunk man!

John drougan: Sorry meh was on sum brown stuff…

Mod Taharok: ok… I will have to Warn you please stay off the Forum till you are sober.

WonderGuy6: WTF WHO IS THIS??

John drougan: fuck yaaalllll Wonderguy6… Y wunna by marijuaana???/

WonderGuy6: Mopar PLEASE BAN HIM!!!

Zirak: NNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO [REPORTED]

and That is an example

-THESE ARE MINES ADD THEM IF YOU WISH BUT PUT CREDS TY
~Zirak[/quote]

OOOOO FUCK…thank god that is not a rule.

Read full topic

item.title: Ultimate Guide To Questions
item.dc:creator: @Zirakac Zirakac
item.description:
@Zirakac wrote:

-Misleading links
If you post and Misleading links their is a result in ban like what happened to WonderGuy6 earlier
SO please do not make a link for example [url=http://www.FUCKINGPORN.com]http://www.moparownzu.com/[/url]
as a result you can be banned!

-Innapropriate Images /Videos /ADS
NEVER EVER post innapropriate links to these things!
As it may Effect a 13- Year old life with those pics… trust me you don’t want to do that!
And their are many adults on this forum too that will see porno’s hentai which they will not want!
So please reduce doing that!

-Innapropriate Downloads!
This Includes Keyloggers Fake Crackers Viruses Trojan and other Things that can effect you or your computer… Please do not post it as it will not help the community and this will result in a flame/spam/bump
or people with fucked up computers… So please do not post it if you like the community

-Bragging
Please Do not Brag others… Because they might want proof etc… which can cause either a massive Spammage or
Flame! And our community hates when that happens so please pervent his from happening!

-THESE ARE MINES ADD THEM IF YOU WISH BUT PUT CREDS TY
~Zirak
